name: The Investigation (Thighs)
description:
This is a spiritual successor to an interactive short story I made during the Halloween of 2020.

I felt as though The Woods was a great experiment for me working within a very short time frame and it ended up being over 7k words, which was shocking to someone who thought 'what if someone drives you to a cabin and spooky stuff happens'.

I wanted to make this as a continuation of the events that doesn't assume the player made the choices that lead to a good ending, nor the 'best ending' where everyone leaves safetly.

The Investigation is 4,580 words in total, and has a loose structure to build intrigue. There is a 'good' ending, a 'bad' ending, and a 'joke' ending available.
